comments.body: Note to self. We should harden our expect tests to catch bugs like this in the future. One idea, assert that all symbol occurrences have a SymbolInformation with a naive symbol table implementation.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@      else "`" + methodName + "`"
    }
    val methodSymbol = classSymbol + encodedMethodName + "()."
    val tparams = tparamDsls.map { tparamName =>
      val tparamSymbol = methodSymbol + "[" + tparamName + "]"
